title: The Breakfast Club - Live at Long Haired Music FLAC 44.1KHz 16bi
description:
Long Haired Music presents 'The Breakfast Club', with their latest Album 'Live at Long Haired Music'. 
 
1 Emma Taylor     	    	- 2:30
2 Maggie           	    	- 1:51
3 She's So Depressed       	- 2:57
4 Girl I'm in Love With    	- 2:14
5 Cinnamon         	    	- 1:58
6 Bodies           	    	- 2:41
7 Top Shop         	    	- 2:05
 
If you were at the London 2012 Olympics you might have seen The Breakfast Club entertaining the crowds around the games with their catchy songs and tin box percussion

This version is the CD Quality 44.1KHz 16bit version.  If you'd like to download better quality files, or smaller more compressed files you may prefer the 24bit 44.1 version in FLAC or 320Kbps MP3 or iTunes plus format, which will also be uploaded here today.  If you wish to burn CDs from the files we'd recommend this version.  We like to promote better than CD quality where we can, so search your favourite torrent site and hope you enjoy the experience. 

Long Haired Music record artists without charge and share revenue earned 50/50 with the musicians who performed the work.  If you enjoy what you hear and want to give something back please tell your friends or purchase the record on iTunes, BandCamp or use the paypal donations button at longhairedmusic.com.
